    • getEventDetails

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Event> getEventDetails()
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Exposes the details of the currently loaded event as LiveData. The value will be an Event object on success, or null otherwise.
      Specified by:
      getEventDetails in interface IEventDetailsRepository

    • getEntrantStatus

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Entrant> getEntrantStatus()
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Exposes the current user's entrant status for this event as LiveData. The value will be an Entrant object if the user is involved with the event, or null if they are not logged in or not an entrant.
      Specified by:
      getEntrantStatus in interface IEventDetailsRepository

    • isLoading

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Boolean> isLoading()
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Exposes the current loading state as a boolean LiveData. True if any operation is in progress, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      isLoading in interface IEventDetailsRepository

    • fetchEventAndEntrantDetails

      public void fetchEventAndEntrantDetails(String eventId)
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Kicks off the process of fetching both the event's main details and the current user's entrant status from the data source.
      Specified by:
      fetchEventAndEntrantDetails in interface IEventDetailsRepository
      Parameters:

    • joinWaitingList

      public void joinWaitingList(String eventId)
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Adds the current user to the event's waiting list. The result of this operation will be reflected in the getMessage() LiveData.
      Specified by:
      joinWaitingList in interface IEventDetailsRepository
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to join.

    • leaveWaitingList

      public void leaveWaitingList(String eventId)
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository

      Specified by:
      leaveWaitingList in interface IEventDetailsRepository
      Parameters:

    • updateInvitationStatus

      public void updateInvitationStatus(String eventId, String newStatus)
      Description copied from interface: IEventDetailsRepository
      Updates the current user's invitation status (e.g., to "accepted" or "declined").
      Specified by:
      updateInvitationStatus in interface IEventDetailsRepository
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      newStatus - The new status string to set.
